name: Crimson Canary
description:
Made for Trijam 81 - *It took us longer than 3 hours to make*

You play as a greedy canary who is free from it's cage.  Fly around and poop on the miners while they carry sapphire to their chests!  If you land your poop on top of a miner's head, they will drop their sapphire and get back to mining.  Pick the sapphire up by flying into it.  See how much loot you can steal before time runs out!

Controls:  

Down arrow key to start. 

left arrow keyflap left wingmoves you forward & to the rightright arrow keyflap right wingmoves you forward & to the leftleft & right arrow key(see above)flies you off of the ground & into the airdown arrow keypoop!drops poop below youup arrow keyeat bread (off of the ground)restores number of poops you can take
